title: Escape to Paradise in Hawaii With Dining Inclusions, Spa Credits And More
description: Discover a Hawaiian paradise on the beautiful island of Kauai at the oceanfront Ko’a Kea Hotel & Resort. A world away from the sky scrapers of Waikiki, this multi-award-winning property (named the number one hotel on the island by Travel + Leisure in 2018) sits on the shores of Hawaii's stunning Poipu Beach - all just an easy 40-minute flight from Honolulu. Included is a daily buffet breakfast, an incredible chef's tasting-menu dinner at the award-winning on-site restaurant, a daily US$30 drinks credit and a US$150 spa credit.
location_description: Ko'a Kea Hotel & Resort at Poipu Beach - 2019

title: Escape to Kauai's #1 Resort with Daily Breakfast, Drinks and Dining Credits
description: Discover a Hawaiian paradise on the beautiful island of Kauai at the oceanfront Ko’a Kea Hotel & Resort. A world away from the skyscrapers of Waikiki, this multi-award-winning property - named the number one hotel on the island by Travel + Leisure 2019 - sits on the shores of Hawaii's stunning Poipu Beach, all just an easy 40-minute flight from Honolulu. Included is a daily buffet breakfast, daily US$30 drinks credit and a US$150 dinner credit and all resort fees with a world of complimentary inclusions such as a bottle of wine on arrival, Wi-Fi, Manager's cocktail reception on Wednesdays, daily valet parking and so much more.
location_description: Ko'a Kea Hotel & Resort at Poipu Beach

title: Escape to Paradise in Hawaii
description: Discover a Hawaiian island paradise, Kauai: a world away from the sky scrapers of Waikiki where you can stay in award-winning luxury on the shores of Hawaii's best beach - all just an easy 40-minute flight from Honolulu. Stay at the oceanfront Ko’a Kea Resort on Kauai, rated the number one hotel in Hawaii and enjoy daily breakfast at the award-winning Red Salt Restaurant, US$150 beverage credit and much more.

title: Laidback Kauai Oceanfront Luxury with Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
description: Treat yourself to quintessential laidback luxury on Kauai island's eastern coast. This tropical paradise offers direct access to the pristine sands of Nukolii Beach, while the resort's spa invites relaxation with traditional Hawaiian treatments. Savour island-inspired cuisine at the three onsite restaurants, or explore the nearby Wailua River, famed for its kayaking and paddleboarding.
offer_address: 4331 Kauai Beach Drive, Lihue, Kauai, Hawaii 96766, USA

title: Oceanfront Kauai Resort with Hawaii's Largest Single-Level Outdoor Pool
description:
Discover a Hawaiian paradise on the beautiful island of Kauai at the oceanfront Royal Sonesta Kauai Resort Lihue. A world away from the skyscrapers of Waikiki, this peaceful property sits just steps from Kalapaki Beach. You'll be spoiled by the hotel's long list of luxe facilities, including four onsite restaurants. Head to Kukui’s on Kalapaki Beach for culinary delights served poolside, start your morning with a hot coffee and freshly-baked pastry from Aupaka Terrace or dig into authentic Hawaiin cuisine while soaking in breathtaking ocean views at Duke’s Kauai.

The jewel in the hotel's crown? A glorious pool - the largest single-level outdoor pool in Hawaii. When you’re not lounging by the shimmering water, head to Kalapaki Beach, where you can sunbathe on the sand or take a dip in the turquoise waters. Stay on top of your fitness game at the onsite fitness centre or indulge in total relaxation with a trip to Alexandar Day Spa and Salon.
